description: A joke about a tractor magically transforming in a field.
title: Magic Tractor
n_1: Farmer Joe boasts about his tractor to his curious neighbor.
n_2: Joe points to the road, where the tractor is seen.
c1_2: Watch it go down the road...
n_3: The tractor turns into a field, stunning the neighbor.
n_4: Joe chuckles at the neighbor's amazed reaction.
